info.name: enocean_input_test_02
info.description:
Using an EnOcean Input Device to walk up and down a Scene list.

4 dimmable fixtures, 2 cct fixtures, 2 EnOcean controlled fixtures and 1 Occupancy group.

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
